fr.name: Attaque chargée
fr.description: Attaque sur 2 tours. Durant le premier tour, la défense du lanceur est augmentée de 50 %. Durant le second tour, la défense du lanceur est replacée à son niveau initial.

en.name: Charging attack
en.description: Attack for 2 turns. During the first turn, the defender's defense is increased by 50 %. During the second turn, the defender's defense is replaced to its initial level.
